评论概述: Super cute, though I recommend a petticoat and a different belt!
评论详情: I just wore this dress for a birthday recently, now I can finally write this review!  The craftsmanship itself seems pretty good for a dress of this price—nothing was too lacking, nothing itchy, and I enjoyed wearing it out. The sleeves are especially cute. It was true-to-size for me as well; I had ordered Small and Medium versions (I'm usually a Small or 2-4 in dress size) and the Medium turned out to be too roomy.  The belt that came with it was a simple cloth belt, however... It would slip 'n' slide around a bit much for my liking. As a replacement, I ordered an inexpensive elastic belt with a bow (Meta-U brand on Amazon) like some other people in these reviews, I believe, and it did the job much better with a nice cinch!  Lastly, you will need a petticoat to achieve a fitting 50s silhouette. I got a Medium 24" GRACE KARIN brand one (also on amazon) on sale for about $12/petticoat. I might get a second petticoat to have an even fluffier shape next time, but I digress.  Overall, I ended up being a huge fan of this dress! Received many compliments for it just strolling around a botanical garden. Definitely considering purchasing another. :)
Such a cute dress. I normally wear a medium, sized up to large to be safe but it wasn’t enough! Measurements on sizing chart cannot possibly be accurate!
Dress is just what I needed for the USO show.

The dress had free returns but when I FINALLY received the dress shipping was going to literally cost me more than the dress cost to send it back  . Thankfully Amazon made good on the purchase and refunded my money . Would not purchase this again !

评论概述: poor construction, runs way too small in size
评论详情: I have two major problems with this dress:(1) the included Size Chart is in numerical designation (size 0, 2, 4, 6, etc.) whereas the dress is sold in "Small, Medium, Large, etc."  I am not a psychic to match up numbers with letters without some cross-reference.  And by choosing a Medium, I clearly failed.  Although I didn't end up wearing it, just by holding it up against my chest, I could tell that there was no way that it would fit me (and if by some miracle I could squeeze into it, it would not survive the first time it went through a dry cycle).  For reference, I am 5'3" 125 lbs and 36B, and all I can say is that by Chinese garment factory standards, that must be larger than a Medium.(2) The dress does not look half as elegant, half as full in the skirt part than in the picture.  I ended up returning it because there were pieces of thread sticking out along the seams everywhere.  It's clearly cheaply constructed.  I could see it unravel after being washed.  Honestly, at $40 ($36.66 + tax) that's hardly cheap for a very cheaply constructed and poorly identified (size) garment.

I bought the solid light blue and am happy with the fit- I am about 120 lbs 5’5” usually size 4 and medium was perfect. The material has a bit of stretch and isn’t see through. I wish it had pockets but otherwise it’s a cute dress and I’m happy with it!

(Family member review) My mom bought the teal dress with lapels for me. I was excited and looking forward to its arrival, and when it finally came, I opened it and went straight to try it on. I had read the comments on this dress before buying it and knew it ran small, so my mom ordered a large for me instead of a medium, which is my regular size. It fit very well... from the hips down. I'm tall, so I was relieved that the dress went over my knees, but the bust and sleeves were very tight. I couldn't raise my hands or move my arms around very much because it was so tight. I was very disappointed. If you're considering buying this dress, I recommend ordering at least two sizes up. It's a real bummer because, again, the dress itself was beautiful, but just too small. We'll probably return it soon. Thank you :)
